text:
Barry S. Coe (born Barry Clark Heacock, November 26, 1934 – July 16, 2019) was an American actor. He co-starred in one series, titled "Follow the Sun", which aired on ABC during the 1961-1962 season. He also played "Mr. Goodwrench" on TV commercials in the 1970s and 1980s.
Coe died on July 16, 2019 from myelodysplastic syndrome in Palm Desert, California at the age of 84.
